title.native: カードファイト!! ヴァンガード overDress Season2

description:
The second season of Cardfight!! Vanguard: overDress.

After the sudden departure of a valuable friend, the future of Team Blackout is now uncertain. Yu-yu Kondou and Megumi Ookura feel frustrated for failing to prevent the inevitable, while the heavily involved Touya Ebata is trying his best to atone for past mistakes that led to this misfortune. But whatever they decide to do next, the members of Team Blackout know that they will always find their way back together through their precious card game, Cardfight Vanguard.

(Source: MAL Rewrite)
synonyms: การ์ดไฟท์!! แวนการ์ด โอเวอร์เดรส ภาค 2

node.description: [Website](http://www.clamp-net.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/CLAMP_news) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/clamp_4_official/) CLAMP is an all-female Japanese manga artist group that formed in the mid-1980s. It consists of leader [Nanase Ohkawa](https://anilist.co/staff/97292), and three artists who shift roles for each series: [Mokona](https://anilist.co/staff/100802) (もこな), [Tsubaki Nekoi](https://anilist.co/staff/100804), and Satsuki Igarashi (いがらし寒月). Almost 100 million CLAMP tankōbon copies have been sold worldwide as of October 2007. In general, Ohkawa gets her inspiration for the group from everyday events such as dreams or the news. Unlike most manga artists who specialize in a single genre, CLAMP has created a diverse body of work. CLAMP's genres vary widely, from childish and comedic (Cardcaptor Sakura, Clamp School Detectives) to more dramatic and teen-rated (xxxHolic, X) series. Furthermore, drawing from the idea of Osamu Tezuka's Star System as they did in Tsubasa: Reservoir Chronicle, CLAMP often crossover characters from their own series into their other works, which gives rise to a loosely defined "Clamp Universe".

[Official Website](https://bushiroad.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kidanit)

Takaaki Kidani is a Japanese businessman. He is the founder and president of Bushiroad. Kidani has also served as the chairman of New Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW). He continues to be involved with NJPW through Bushiroad, in which owns the company.

He founded Bushiroad in May 2007 as a company that produces card games and assumed the position of president. The origin of the name Bushiroad comes from the failure to make Neppu Kairiku Bushi Road into a film due to various reasons when he led the project in the days of Broccoli. The film was restarted in March 2013 with Kidani as the executive producer. The company would create numerous media franchises including Tantei Opera Milky Holmes and BanG Dream!

Akira Ito (伊藤 彰, Itō Akira) is a manga artist. Ito drew Yu-Gi-Oh! R while the creator of the Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise, Kazuki Takahashi, came up with the storyline. Ito's drawing style is similar to Takahashi's. Ito later co-created Cardfight!! Vanguard in collaboration with Satoshi Nakamura (technical advisor for Duel Masters) and Bushiroad president Takaaki Kidani, he is also the author of Cardfight!! Vanguard manga and Cardfight!! Vanguard G: THE PROLOGUE, as well as the illustrator/designer of several cards in the Cardfight!! Vanguard game.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/amane_bushi) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/amane_shindo_official/) |  [Agency Profile](https://hibiki-cast.jp/hibiki_f/shindou_amane/)__

A voice actor affiliated with Hibiki and the main vocalist in the band [Morfonica](https://anilist.co/staff/162066/Morfonica), as a part of the BanG Dream! franchise. She is also part of the duo Oyunesu with Yuka Nishio.

Amane was scouted in 2018 by Hibiki at 14 years old, making her the youngest voice actress to join the agency at the time. She then debuted with the role of Caro in the anime Bermuda Triangle: Colorful Pastrale. The band Morfonica and her role as its vocalist and Mashiro Kurata's voice actor was announced in early 2020; prior to this, she was a big BanG Dream! fan, with Pastel*Palettes being her favorite band. Besides Bandori, Amane is also an avid fan of Love Live! and Revue Starlight, and likes posting her gacha rolls from their games on Twitter. She also enjoys playing #COMPASS (COMbat Providence AnalysiS System) and Blazblue.

Amane's other hobbies include collecting stuffed animals (especially marine animals), singing, and illustrating. She also knows how to play the electric guitar, is learning how to play the acoustic guitar, and knows how to dance (cheer, ballet, and hiphop). She likes horror movies, dislikes sweet foods, and has an older sister. Her favorite colors are pink and green, and her favorite foods are Dr. Pepper, cup yakisoba, mayo beam, poached chicken breast, cheese, iekei ramen, meat, wakame stems, matcha, and raw seafood.

node.description:
__[Website](https://strawberryprince.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/StPri_info) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdB5vhQORw9HeiF82IYLnjw)__

__Introduction:__
Strawberry Prince, alternatively known as StPri, is a Japanese 6-member entertainment group and unit consisting of various utaite. 

__Biography:__
The current members are noted to be particularly close, as shown by a large number of collab covers. Besides singing they also post various small skits, collaborate and solo, to their individual channels.

Although it isn't officially confirmed, they have a pattern with their covers suggesting duets to be their forté, an example is their duet "[Dance of Venus](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ICuLhf1OckI&feature=youtu.be)", where you can experience how well they harmonize with one another.

__Members:__
- [Nanamori](https://anilist.co/staff/202769/Nanamori) (ななもり) – vocalist
- [Root](https://anilist.co/staff/181478/Root) (るぅと) – vocalist, also does composition
- [Colon](https://anilist.co/staff/202768/Colon) (ころん) – vocalist
- [Satomi](https://anilist.co/staff/198949/Satomi) (さとみ) – vocalist
- [Rinu](https://anilist.co/staff/148136/Rinu) (莉犬) – vocalist
- [Jel](https://anilist.co/staff/202767/Jel) (ジェル) – vocalist

__Former Members:__
- [Kanna](https://twitter.com/kanna0kyun) (かんな) – vocalist
- [Shiyun](https://twitter.com/shiyun_2525) (しゆん) – vocalist
- [Ketchup](https://twitter.com/ketchup_N1) (けちゃっぷ) – vocalist
- [Yuuku](https://twitter.com/yuuku_2525) (ゆうく) – vocalist
